column2: everything was delicious! The quality of their fish is amazing and fresh
column3: definitely top notch. My favorite item was the toro uni caviar sushi. You get blue fin tuna with sea urchin and caviar on top. Ugh soooo good. I thought the uni pasta was just okay. It had more of a mushroom flavor that was overpowering
column4: and I wish there were more pieces of uni in it. I probably wouldn't order the uni pasta again. Anyway
column5: I can't wait for my next visit to Kata Robata!
